job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to the development of GenAI services that are integral to our product offerings and user experiences.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the development of services, which are software components, and their integration into user-facing products.

job_tasks.phrase: Implement coding best practices to foster code modularity, reusability, and maintainability, enabling our AI services to remain flexible for future advancements.
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on software engineering principles like best practices, modularity, reusability, and maintainability, which are core to software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI services into the wider product ecosystem, ensuring a smooth developer experience.
job_tasks.justification: Highlights integration of services into a larger ecosystem and the developer experience, which are software development concerns.

job_tasks.phrase: Assess and optimize existing AI services to enhance performance and conform to the latest industry trends.
job_tasks.justification: Assessing and optimizing AI services implies working with the underlying AI models and their performance, a key aspect of the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay informed on the latest AI technologies and programming techniques, exploring their applicability to our services.
job_tasks.justification: While broad, 'exploring their applicability to our services' can encompass understanding and potentially applying new data processing or feature engineering techniques if relevant to AI services.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay informed on the latest AI technologies and programming techniques, exploring their applicability to our services.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase also covers staying updated on programming techniques relevant to building and evolving software services.

soft_skills.phrase: Support and mentor other engineers, contributing to a culture that values technical skill and code quality.
Stay informed on the latest AI technologies and programming techniques, exploring their applicability to our services.

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the development of 'GenAI services' and integrating them into products. While there's mention of assessing and optimizing AI services (TASK3), the primary focus is on the software development aspects (TASK4) of building and maintaining these services, aligning with the GenAI Engineer profile's core responsibility of building user-facing software around generative models.
